attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government have so far bailed out the banks to a tune of £600bn. Why should we (the public) bail out companies that are on the brink of colapse because they cant keep themselves in order. A lot of the public can no longer access credit as the banks have tightened thier lending criteria. If a member of the public is subject to a credit check which fails, why should they have to bail out a bank that is billions of pounds in debt and unlikely to see a return from lending?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
